articles.author: Emma Street
articles.title: 8 Rare Vintage Tech Products Worth Thousands That Might Be Hiding In Your Attic - bgr.com
articles.description: Collectible tech is a lot newer than most other kinds of vintage items, which might take hundreds of years to become interesting. Nostalgia plays a big part.
articles.content: Although they don't fetch the high sums that analog watches from major luxury brands do, some digital watches are surprisingly collectible. Casio was a major pioneer in digital watches, so it's no su… [+1473 chars]

articles.title: Threads adds new communities, tests badges for highly engaged members - TechCrunch
articles.description: Threads, which has more than 150 million daily active users, adds more communities to its platform.
articles.content: Meta’s social network Threads is expanding the number of topics available through its newer communities feature, the company announced on Monday. This expansion might nudge people to use communities … [+1383 chars]
